scripts.release: npm run unpack && npm run csv2json && npm run symbols2json && npm run build && surge -p stock-data.surge.sh
scripts.unpack: for f in $(find . | sort | grep .tar.gz); do mkdir ${f%.tar.gz}; tar -xaf $f -C ${f%.tar.gz}; rm $f ; done
scripts.csv2json: for f in $(find . | sort | grep .csv); do echo $f ; alasql "select * from CSV('$f')" > ${f%.csv}.json  ;  rm $f ; done
scripts.symbols2json: for f in $(find . | sort | grep symbols.txt); do echo $f ; echo "symbol	name" | cat - $f > /tmp/out && mv /tmp/out $f ; alasql "select * from TSV('$f')" > ${f%.txt}.json  ; rm $f ; done
scripts.build:
rm CNAME && echo "

Pystock data raw


Files:
" > index.html && for f in $(find . -type f | sort -nr | grep .json); do echo "$f
" >> index.html; done
